thread.title: Lost Property: Cabbies receive compulosry rewards based on the value of the item
thread.title_full: Lost Property: Cabbies receive compulosry rewards based on the value of the item

author: Martin Evans
title: Lost Property: Cabbies receive compulosry rewards based on the value of the item
text: Road and rail transport Lost Property: Cabbies receive compulosry rewards based on the value of the item Lost property rewards given to black cab drivers are calculated on a sliding scale, with low value items charged at 15 per cent of their value and the most expensive goods, charged at one per cent. Photo: Getty Images
